box.title: 表格与图形的联动
box.text: ps:点击指标值，柱状图也会刷新

chart.label: cid2
chart.title: $month_id.substring(0, 4)年$month_id.substring(4, 6)月
chart.ds: select t.MONTH_ID, b.pro_no, b.pro_name,b.ord, sum(KPI_VALUE) value, c.kpi_desc from dm_kpi_w_card_pandect_m t, dmcode_province b, dmcode_kpi_lib c where t.prov_id = b.pro_no and month_id = '${month_id}' and t.kpi_code = '${kpi_code}' and t.kpi_code = c.kpi_code group by t.MONTH_ID, b.pro_no, b.pro_name,b.ord, c.kpi_desc order by t.MONTH_ID desc, b.ord

crossReport.ds: select t.month_id, t.kpi_code, k.kpi_desc, sum(t.kpi_value) kpi_value from dm_kpi_w_card_pandect_m t, dmcode_kpi_lib k where t.kpi_code =k.kpi_code and t.kpi_code in ('A0001', 'A0002', 'A0003', 'A0004', 'A0005', 'A0006', 'A0007', 'A0008') group by t.month_id, t.kpi_code, k.kpi_desc order by month_id desc
